name: Binary Games
description:
Become a math master with binary games.

Train your brain in 3 math based games that will sharpen your math skills.

Learn binary over the 12+ binary challenges.

Play 3 binary puzzle games (Binary Grid, Binary Tap and Binary Guess).

Learn binary as you play over the 4 modes (4 bit, 6 bit, 8 bit and 10 bit) as well as in the library which contains examples of binary conversions for numbers, letters and symbols.

Convert in the binary converter for numbers and letters.

- 3 Games.
- 4 modes (4, 6 ,8 and 10 bit).
- Timed and untimed modes.
- 12+ leaderboards.
- Text to binary converter.
- Number to binary converter.
- Binary library for numbers, letters and symbols.
